paths.title: The Drupal 8 Beginner Class
paths.description: Welcome to our complete, free beginner class on using Drupal 8. This class was created by the team at http://OSTraining.com and made possible through the sponsorship of http://Acquia.com. It was brought to http://Outlearn.com for you by http://Pronovix.com.
